metadata.title: CVE-2016-0546 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle MySQL 5.5.46 and earlier, 5.6.27 andearlier, and 5.7.9 and MariaDB before 5.5.47, 10.0.x before 10.0.23, and10.1.x before 10.1.10 allows local users to affect confidentiality,integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to Client.  NOTE:the previous information is from the January 2016 CPU. Oracle has notcommented on third-party claims that these are multiple buffer overflows inthe mysqlshow tool that allow remote database servers to have unspecifiedimpact via a long table or database name.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-0546` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient18 - 5.5.47-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
libmysqld-pic - 5.5.47-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-client - 5.5.47-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-client-5.5 - 5.5.47-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.5 - 5.5.47-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-common - 5.5.47-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server - 5.5.47-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server-5.5 - 5.5.47-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.5 - 5.5.47-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-source-5.5 - 5.5.47-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.5.47-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.5 - 5.5.47-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

mysql-client-5.6 - 5.6.28-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.6 - 5.6.28-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-common-5.6 - 5.6.28-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server-5.6 - 5.6.28-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.6 - 5.6.28-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-source-5.6 - 5.6.28-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.6 - 5.6.28-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

libmariadbclient18 - 5.5.47-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-client - 5.5.47-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-client-5.5 - 5.5.47-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-client-core-5.5 - 5.5.47-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-common - 5.5.47-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-server - 5.5.47-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-server-5.5 - 5.5.47-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-server-core-5.5 - 5.5.47-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-test - 5.5.47-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
mariadb-test-5.5 - 5.5.47-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mysql-5.5 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.5.47-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
mysql-5.6 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.6.28-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
mariadb-5.5 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.5.47-1ubuntu0.14.04.1').
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
